channel.title: Attack of the Show Video Podcast
channel.description: The Podcast That Gets It, Before It Gets Out.

image.title: Attack of the Show Video Podcast

channel.itunes:author: G4
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Podcast That Gets It, Before It Gets Out.
channel.itunes:summary: Attack of the Show gets you inside, underneath, around, and behind the newest tech, the hottest games, the fastest-breaking news, and the oddest oddities from the fringe. There's the inside track, and then there are those who pave the inside track. Also be sure to look for other awesome G4 video podcasts in the G4 iTunes page.
channel.itunes:keywords: technology video games comedy daily humor kevin pereira olivia munn videogames aots g4 wil oneal chris gore anna david zach selwin

item.title: Joe Rogan Returns To AOTS
item.description: If there's anyone Kevin Pereira sit down with for his final celebrity interview for 'Attack of the Show,' it's Joe Rogan.
item.itunes:subtitle: If there's anyone Kevin Pereira sit down with for his final celebrity interview for 'Attack of the Show,' it's Joe Rogan.

item.title: Kevin Pereira's Last Walk Through Attack Of The Show
item.description: Kevin Pereira walks through his favorite and most iconic moments from 'Attack of the Show' before leaving the set for the last time.
item.itunes:subtitle: Kevin Pereira walks through his favorite and most iconic moments from 'Attack of the Show' before leaving the set for the last time.

item.title: Jerry Springer Interviews Kevin Pereira
item.description: The one and only Jerry Springer asks Kevin Pereira hard-hitting questions about the past ten years G4, from how he got started at the network and worked his way up to become the co-host of 'Attack of the Show.'
item.itunes:subtitle: The one and only Jerry Springer asks Kevin Pereira hard-hitting questions about the past ten years G4, from how he got started at the network and worked his way up to become the co-host of 'Attack of the Show.'

item.title: James Gunn & Matt Atchity Tell You What To Watch
item.description: So many movies! So many TV shows! So many YouTube videos! Where should you start? We invite filmmaker James Gunn and Rotten Tomatoes' Editor-in-Chief, Matt Atchity, on what you should start watching right now.
item.itunes:subtitle: So many movies! So many TV shows! So many YouTube videos! Where should you start? We invite filmmaker James Gunn and Rotten Tomatoes' Editor-in-Chief, Matt Atchity, on what you should start watching right now.

item.title: The Cinestar 8 Octocopter Demo In Studio!
item.description: Filmmaking is hitting new heights with the Cinestar 8 Octocopter, a robotic camera platform that can reach up to 1,500 feet in the air! Jeff Moriarty and Matt Herrier from Laminated Pictures give Matt Mira and Candace Bailey a live in-studio demo!
item.itunes:subtitle: Filmmaking is hitting new heights with the Cinestar 8 Octocopter, a robotic camera platform that can reach up to 1,500 feet in the air! Jeff Moriarty and Matt Herrier from Laminated Pictures give Matt Mira and Candace Bailey a live in-studio demo!

item.title: Jessica Chobot Explores The SpaceX Headquarters
item.description: Jessica Chobot visits Space X, the first privately owned space transport company, to get a close look at their Dragon spacecraft and their upcoming plans for more missions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jessica Chobot visits Space X, the first privately owned space transport company, to get a close look at their Dragon spacecraft and their upcoming plans for more missions.

item.title: Distended Warranty's Red Ring Of Death Music Video
item.description: Kevin Pereira and Candace Bailey take a look at another Attack of the Show classic, the "Red Ring of Death" music video by metal band, Distended Warranty.
item.itunes:subtitle: Kevin Pereira and Candace Bailey take a look at another Attack of the Show classic, the "Red Ring of Death" music video by metal band, Distended Warranty.

item.title: Patton Oswalt on The Webby Awards, Comedy & More
item.description: Patton Oswalt returns to the AOTS studios to talk about his latest project as host of the Webby Awards!
item.itunes:subtitle: Patton Oswalt returns to the AOTS studios to talk about his latest project as host of the Webby Awards!

item.title: Tom Kenny on SpongeBob SquarePants, Voice Acting & More
item.description: Tom Kenny, the comedian and voice behind SpongeBob SquarePants, talks to Kevin Pereira about his iconic cartoon role, what it's like being a voice actor and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tom Kenny, the comedian and voice behind SpongeBob SquarePants, talks to Kevin Pereira about his iconic cartoon role, what it's like being a voice actor and more.

item.title: Tales from the Console Graveyard: Nintendo GameCube
item.description: Remember the Nintendo GameCube? How could you forget? This trip to the Console Graveyard with Kevin Pereira, Blair Herter and Matt Mira is all about the system from 2001 that offered great games like Mario Sunshine, Mario Kart and others.
item.itunes:subtitle: Remember the Nintendo GameCube? How could you forget? This trip to the Console Graveyard with Kevin Pereira, Blair Herter and Matt Mira is all about the system from 2001 that offered great games like Mario Sunshine, Mario Kart and others.

item.title: A New ISP That Protects Your Privacy
item.description: With the growing concerns over privacy rights and the government wiretapping the web, the Calyx Institute plans to offer an ISP that keeps your Internet activity private. Kevin Pereira talks to executive director Nick Merrill about the service.
item.itunes:subtitle: With the growing concerns over privacy rights and the government wiretapping the web, the Calyx Institute plans to offer an ISP that keeps your Internet activity private. Kevin Pereira talks to executive director Nick Merrill about the service.

item.title: Sony HT-CT550W 3D Sound Bar Review
item.description: Sony's 3D HT-CT550W Sound Bar system offers 3D surround sound in a compact size with a simple set-up, a wireless subwoofer and more for $399. Kevin Pereira joins Matt Mira to find out how many Seals of Approval this system deserves on Gadget Pr0n.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sony's 3D HT-CT550W Sound Bar system offers 3D surround sound in a compact size with a simple set-up, a wireless subwoofer and more for $399. Kevin Pereira joins Matt Mira to find out how many Seals of Approval this system deserves on Gadget Pr0n.

item.title: How To Turn Waste Into Energy
item.description: We head back to Clarkson University to find out how they've set up a self-sustaining system that uses energy from their waste to power their greenhouse and grow food for their cafeteria!
item.itunes:subtitle: We head back to Clarkson University to find out how they've set up a self-sustaining system that uses energy from their waste to power their greenhouse and grow food for their cafeteria!

item.title: Brett Gelman's Spreadable Beard Infomercial
item.description: Comedian Brett Gelman shares his secret to fame and popularity: his beard! Find out how you, too, can be just like him with one easy fix. Buy Gelman's Spreadable Beard today!
item.itunes:subtitle: Comedian Brett Gelman shares his secret to fame and popularity: his beard! Find out how you, too, can be just like him with one easy fix. Buy Gelman's Spreadable Beard today!

item.title: Eddie Izzard On Treasure Island, New Comedy Tour & Running Marathons
item.description: Eddie Izzard, stand up comedian and actor, joins Kevin Pereira in studio to talk about his new SyFy film, 'Treasure Island,' his comedy tour plans that will take him around the world and how he runs so many marathons.
item.itunes:subtitle: Eddie Izzard, stand up comedian and actor, joins Kevin Pereira in studio to talk about his new SyFy film, 'Treasure Island,' his comedy tour plans that will take him around the world and how he runs so many marathons.

item.title: Dude Manrod's Manly Tips For Movies
item.description: Dude Manrod is back, just in time for Attack of the Summer Movies! Check out his manly advice on which movies you should watch LIKE A MAN and which ones you should avoid, unless you want the world to know you've got a vagina.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dude Manrod is back, just in time for Attack of the Summer Movies! Check out his manly advice on which movies you should watch LIKE A MAN and which ones you should avoid, unless you want the world to know you've got a vagina.

item.title: Jackie Earle Haley On Dark Shadows
item.description: Jackie Earle Haley from 'Watchmen' and 'A Nightmare on Elm Street' is back inside the AOTS studios with Kevin Pereira to talk about his latest role as Willie Loomis in Tim Burton's 'Dark Shadows' remake.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jackie Earle Haley from 'Watchmen' and 'A Nightmare on Elm Street' is back inside the AOTS studios with Kevin Pereira to talk about his latest role as Willie Loomis in Tim Burton's 'Dark Shadows' remake.

item.title: John Cho Talks Total Recall Reboot
item.description: John Cho from 'Harold & Kumar' returns to 'Attack of the Show' to talk about the highly anticipated reboot of 'Total Recall' with Colin Farrell.
item.itunes:subtitle: John Cho from 'Harold & Kumar' returns to 'Attack of the Show' to talk about the highly anticipated reboot of 'Total Recall' with Colin Farrell.

item.title: Supervillain Primary Debate 2012 On The Military
item.description: The Supervillain Primary Debate continues as the nominees discuss the important issues with our military and national security.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Supervillain Primary Debate continues as the nominees discuss the important issues with our military and national security.

item.title: How To Harvest Electricity From Lobsters
item.description: We head to Clarkson University to check out their experiments with harnessing electric energy from lobsters through enzymes and their glucose molecules. You can just taste the delicious power!
item.itunes:subtitle: We head to Clarkson University to check out their experiments with harnessing electric energy from lobsters through enzymes and their glucose molecules. You can just taste the delicious power!

item.title: Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol, Shame, Frozen Planet DVD Review
item.description: DVDuesday returns with Chris Gore and Candace Bailey as they cover this week's DVD and Blu-ray picks like Tom Cruise in 'Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol,' Michael Fassbender's 'Shame' and 'Frozen Planet.'
item.itunes:subtitle: DVDuesday returns with Chris Gore and Candace Bailey as they cover this week's DVD and Blu-ray picks like Tom Cruise in 'Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol,' Michael Fassbender's 'Shame' and 'Frozen Planet.'

item.title: Johnny Cupcakes & KidRobot Threads
item.description: This edition of Threads takes you to the Johnny Cupcakes store in Los Angeles where we take a look at their Animal Kingdom Line. Then we head over to KidRobot for their new Spring 2012 collection and signature vinyl toys!
item.itunes:subtitle: This edition of Threads takes you to the Johnny Cupcakes store in Los Angeles where we take a look at their Animal Kingdom Line. Then we head over to KidRobot for their new Spring 2012 collection and signature vinyl toys!

item.title: Tales From The Console Graveyard: PlayStation
item.description: Time to let your memories grow with another tale from the console graveyard! This time, Kevin Pereira, Adam Sessler, Blair Herter and Morgan Webb reminisce about the success of the original PlayStation.
item.itunes:subtitle: Time to let your memories grow with another tale from the console graveyard! This time, Kevin Pereira, Adam Sessler, Blair Herter and Morgan Webb reminisce about the success of the original PlayStation.

item.title: Top Gear's Richard Hammond Talks Crash Course
item.description: Richard Hammond from 'Top Gear' is heading across the pond with his new BBC America show, 'Crash Course.' He stops by the studio to talk to Kevin Pereira about what it's like driving some of the craziest and most dangerous vehicles in the US.
item.itunes:subtitle: Richard Hammond from 'Top Gear' is heading across the pond with his new BBC America show, 'Crash Course.' He stops by the studio to talk to Kevin Pereira about what it's like driving some of the craziest and most dangerous vehicles in the US.

item.title: HTC Vivid Smartphone Review
item.description: The HTC Vivid comes with a 4.5" touch screen, a 960x540 resolution, a 1.2 GHz processor and Android's Ice Cream Sandwich OS. So does the $199 smartphone live up to its name? Matt Mira and Kevin Pereira take a look on Gadget Pr0n.
item.itunes:subtitle: The HTC Vivid comes with a 4.5" touch screen, a 960x540 resolution, a 1.2 GHz processor and Android's Ice Cream Sandwich OS. So does the $199 smartphone live up to its name? Matt Mira and Kevin Pereira take a look on Gadget Pr0n.

item.title: Morgan Spurlock & Stan Lee Talks Comic-Con Episode IV

item.itunes:subtitle: Director Morgan Spurlock and the legendary Stan Lee visit 'Attack of the Show' for their new documentary about the ultimate nerd convention with 'Comic-Con Episode IV: A Fan's Hope.'

item.itunes:subtitle: Felicia Day returns to 'Attack of the Show' to talk about her new Premium YouTube channel, Geek & Sundry, that offers everything you need to know about indie geek culture.

item.title: Community's Jim Rash Teaches Us How To Win An Oscar
item.description: Jim Rash doesn't only perform as Dean Pelton on NBC's cult show, 'Community.' He's also an Academy Award winning screenwriter! We caught up with him backstage to find out how someone can go about winning an Oscar of their own.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Rash doesn't only perform as Dean Pelton on NBC's cult show, 'Community.' He's also an Academy Award winning screenwriter! We caught up with him backstage to find out how someone can go about winning an Oscar of their own.

item.title: Why Employers Are Asking For Your Facebook Password
item.description: There's a growing practice of employers requesting job applicants for either their Facebook password or to log into their account as a part of the interview process. But is this a violation of your privacy?
item.itunes:subtitle: There's a growing practice of employers requesting job applicants for either their Facebook password or to log into their account as a part of the interview process. But is this a violation of your privacy?

item.title: Rad Jobs With LEGO!
item.description: What if you got paid to play with LEGOS all day? That's what LEGO master builder Erik Varszegi gets to do at the LEGO headquarters in Connecticut. Grace Helbig checks out the facilities for an exclusive tour.
item.itunes:subtitle: What if you got paid to play with LEGOS all day? That's what LEGO master builder Erik Varszegi gets to do at the LEGO headquarters in Connecticut. Grace Helbig checks out the facilities for an exclusive tour.

item.title: Motorola Droid RAZR MAXX Review

item.title: Lemon, Task Rabbit & Other Useful Apps Review
item.description: Check out these three apps that help organize your life, like Lemon, a program that keeps track of your spending by scanning receipts, or Task Rabbit to keep track of your to-do list and Local Mind.
item.itunes:subtitle: Check out these three apps that help organize your life, like Lemon, a program that keeps track of your spending by scanning receipts, or Task Rabbit to keep track of your to-do list and Local Mind.

item.title: Supervillain Primary Debate 2012 Discuss Health Care Reform

item.title: Kony 2012: How Social Media Changes Activism
item.description: The recent viral campaign called Kony 2012 has been making waves on Twitter and Facebook, but what does this mean for social activists? Kevin Pereira talks to Cenk Uygur and Ana Kasparian from The Young Turks to discuss the situation.
item.itunes:subtitle: The recent viral campaign called Kony 2012 has been making waves on Twitter and Facebook, but what does this mean for social activists? Kevin Pereira talks to Cenk Uygur and Ana Kasparian from The Young Turks to discuss the situation.

item.description: LulzSec may have been behind some of the biggest hackings of the web but their fun has come to the end with the arrests of some of their members. Kevin Pereira and FoxNews.com's Jana Winter find out how the investigation came together.
item.itunes:subtitle: LulzSec may have been behind some of the biggest hackings of the web but their fun has come to the end with the arrests of some of their members. Kevin Pereira and FoxNews.com's Jana Winter find out how the investigation came together.

item.title: How AT&T Is Throttling Unlimited Data Users
item.description: Some AT&T users are discovering that their unlimited data plans aren't so unlimited after all. Kevin Pereira discusses the issue of AT&T throttling the top 5% of heavy data users by reducing their speeds.
item.itunes:subtitle: Some AT&T users are discovering that their unlimited data plans aren't so unlimited after all. Kevin Pereira discusses the issue of AT&T throttling the top 5% of heavy data users by reducing their speeds.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus 4G LTE Review
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Nexus 4G LTE features more than just a sleek look. The smartphone is the first optimized for Android's 4.0 OS, runs on Verizon's super fast 4G network and is only $299 with a contract.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Samsung Galaxy Nexus 4G LTE features more than just a sleek look. The smartphone is the first optimized for Android's 4.0 OS, runs on Verizon's super fast 4G network and is only $299 with a contract.

item.title: Nikon 1 J1 Camera Review
item.description: The Nikon 1 J1 camera gives you the ability to take great pictures without dragging around an DSLR. With features like a high resolution 3" screen, 12 megapixel image sensor and the world's fastest autofocus, this camera may be worth the $600 price tag.

item.description: This Sharp AQUOS Quattron 70"LC-70LE735U means that when you want your TV to go big, you go BIG. This super thin LCD television is more than just huge; it also features Quattron technology, 3D capabilities, built-in Wi-Fi and more.

item.title: Airwalk's 25th Anniversary Sneakers & More
item.description: Celebrate milestones with your feet, like Airwalk's 25th anniversary and their re-issued retro shoes that bring back serious memories. If that's not your style, then check out Tauntr, an online store that offers sneakers made with your favorite TV show in

item.title: Samsung Plasma 8000 Series Smart TV Review
item.description: The Samsung PN59D8000 Plasma television comes backed with features in a super thin design that measures only 1.5" deep. Throw in Samsung's Smart hub, and this TV also has access to Hulu and Netflix for endless entertainment.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Samsung PN59D8000 Plasma television comes backed with features in a super thin design that measures only 1.5" deep. Throw in Samsung's Smart hub, and this TV also has access to Hulu and Netflix for endless entertainment.

item.title: LG Insignia LW5600 3D TV Review
item.description: The LG Insignia LW5600 3D TV comes with a 55" LCD screen, LG Cinema 3D technology and limitless entertainment with the LG Smart TV feature. But how do all these features play out? Kevin Pereira and Candace Bailey take a closer look on Gadget Pr0n.
item.itunes:subtitle: The LG Insignia LW5600 3D TV comes with a 55" LCD screen, LG Cinema 3D technology and limitless entertainment with the LG Smart TV feature. But how do all these features play out? Kevin Pereira and Candace Bailey take a closer look on Gadget Pr0n.

item.title: Sony Bravia BX42 32" LCD HDTV Review
item.description: The Sony Bravia BX42 32" LCD TV comes with full HD 1080p picture quality, five HD inputs, automatic picture adjustment and Bravia Sync to communicate with other Sony products for the ultimate TV watching experience.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sony Bravia BX42 32" LCD TV comes with full HD 1080p picture quality, five HD inputs, automatic picture adjustment and Bravia Sync to communicate with other Sony products for the ultimate TV watching experience.
